Data.event_text: — Marco Antonio Sanchez Flores, a student at Prepa 8 in Mexico City, is detained by the Secretaria de Seguridad Publica and the Policia Auxiliar. Several hours later, he was released in Melchor Ocampo, State of Mexico. Months later, the detention is unexplained.

links.text: -"Se estrella avioneta en Puebla en pleno 24 de diciembre". El Sol de Puebla. 24 December 2018. Retrieved July 11, 2019.-

Data.event_text: — A helicopter of the SEDENA crashes, leaving 14 dead. The helicopter, which was carrying the Secretary of the Interior, Alfonso Navarrete Prida and the Governor of Oaxaca, Alejandro Murat, crashed in Santiago Jamiltepec, Oaxaca, as it was inspecting the damage caused by an earthquake with a magnitude of 7.2 that had taken place at 539 p.m.

links.text: -"Se estrella avioneta en Puebla en pleno 24 de diciembre". El Sol de Puebla. 24 December 2018. Retrieved July 11, 2019.-

Data.event_text: Five minors are killed and three are injured when their car crashes on Eje 10 Sur in Mexico City. They had visited a fair in Santa Catarina Yecahuízotl, Tláhuac.

Three film students from the Universidad de Medios Audiovisuales (CAAV), Javier Salomón Aceves Gastélum, Daniel Díaz y Marcos Ávalos, disappeared in Tonalá, Jalisco. Later it was discovered that the students were beaten and killed, and their bodies were dissolved in acid.

links.text: -"Se estrella avioneta en Puebla en pleno 24 de diciembre". El Sol de Puebla. 24 December 2018. Retrieved July 11, 2019.-

Data.event_text: A man walks into a store in "Reforma 222" shopping mall in Mexico City, shoots his ex-wife, and causes panic among the shoppers.
Campaigning for the 2018 Mexican general election begins.
— U.S. President Donald Trump threatens to militarize its southern border.

links.text: -"Se estrella avioneta en Puebla en pleno 24 de diciembre". El Sol de Puebla. 24 December 2018. Retrieved July 11, 2019.-

Data.event_text: Despite not having sufficient signatures, Jaime Rodríguez Calderón "El Bronco" is allowed to run for President as an independent candidate.
After two weeks, a capuchin monkey is captured and taken to Chapultepec Zoo.
First Presidential debate, in Mexico City is watched by 11.4 million people.
A crack in the high-speed lane of Viaducto Miguel Alemán in Iztacalco, Mexico City, frightens motorists. It requires 1,100 m3 of concrete to be repaired.
Margarita Zavala, the only female candidate for President, drops out.
— An airplane crash in Cuba results in the deaths of 112 people, including the seven members of the crew, all Mexicans.

links.text: -"Se estrella avioneta en Puebla en pleno 24 de diciembre". El Sol de Puebla. 24 December 2018. Retrieved July 11, 2019.-

Data.event_text: Second Presidential debate, in Tijuana, Baja California
— Andrés Manuel López Obrador wins the presidency.

links.text: -"Se estrella avioneta en Puebla en pleno 24 de diciembre". El Sol de Puebla. 24 December 2018. Retrieved July 11, 2019.-

Data.event_text: Elba Esther Gordillo Morales is cleared of charges of money laundering and organized crime membership, after spending five years in prison.
Roberto Moyado Esparza, a.k.a. ‘El Betito’, presumed leader of La Unión de Tepito drug gang, is arrested.
— The government issues a new MXN $500 bill, featuring Benito Juarez.

links.text: -"Se estrella avioneta en Puebla en pleno 24 de diciembre". El Sol de Puebla. 24 December 2018. Retrieved July 11, 2019.-

Data.event_text: — A group of pseudo-students known as porros attack a peaceful march by students from the Colegio de Ciencias y Humanidades (CCH) Azcapotzalco, Universidad Nacional Autónoma de México (UNAM), who were demanding greater security measures on campus. Several students are injured.

links.text: -"Se estrella avioneta en Puebla en pleno 24 de diciembre". El Sol de Puebla. 24 December 2018. Retrieved July 11, 2019.-

Data.event_text: Peña Nieto leads the Independence Day Celebration for the last time.
50th anniversary of the Tlatelolco massacre.
- The collapse of a shopping mall under construction in the Mexican city of Monterrey results in at least 7 deaths and nine people missing. 15 others are injured.
— Repairs to the water system in Mexico City and the State of Mexico leave millions without water for a week.

links.text: -"Se estrella avioneta en Puebla en pleno 24 de diciembre". El Sol de Puebla. 24 December 2018. Retrieved July 11, 2019.-

Data.event_text: — The trial of Joaquín "El Chapo" Loera Guzman begins in New York, accused of drug trafficking.

links.text: -"Se estrella avioneta en Puebla en pleno 24 de diciembre". El Sol de Puebla. 24 December 2018. Retrieved July 11, 2019.-

Data.event_text: — President Andrés Manuel López Obrador is inaugurated.
— At 1857 local time, Popocatepetl spews lava, ash and rock.[citation needed]
— The governor of Puebla, Martha Erika Alonso and her husband, Rafael Moreno Valle Rosas, a senator and former state governor, die in a helicopter crash.

links.text: -"7 dead, 9 missing in collapse of northern Mexico mall - ABC News". ABC News. Archived from the original on 2018-10-12.-
-"7 dead, 9 missing in collapse of northern Mexico mall - ABC News". ABC News. Archived from the original on 2018-10-12.-

Data.event_text: Seven minor children burn to death in a fire in their home in Buenavista, Iztapalapa, Mexico City.
